name: Profiles
description: All PlayFab entities have profiles, which hold top-level properties about the entity. These APIs give you the tools needed to manage entity profiles.
apiDescriptionList: All PlayFab entities have profiles, which hold top-level properties about the entity. These APIs give you the tools needed to manage entity profiles.

EntityDataObject.name: EntityDataObject
EntityDataObject.description: An entity object and its associated meta data.

properties.name: DataObject
properties.description: Un-escaped JSON object, if DataAsObject is true.

properties.name: EscapedDataObject
properties.description: Escaped string JSON body of the object, if DataAsObject is default or false.

properties.name: ObjectName
properties.description: Name of this object.

EntityKey.name: EntityKey
EntityKey.description: Combined entity type and ID structure which uniquely identifies a single entity.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Unique ID of the entity.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: Entity type. See https://api.playfab.com/docs/tutorials/entities/entitytypes

properties.name: TypeString
properties.description: Alternate name for Type.

properties.name: CharacterId
properties.description: The Character Id of the associated entity.

properties.name: GroupId
properties.description: The Group Id of the associated entity.

properties.name: MasterPlayerAccountId
properties.description: The Master Player Account Id of the associated entity.

properties.name: NamespaceId
properties.description: The Namespace Id of the associated entity.

properties.name: TitleId
properties.description: The Title Id of the associated entity.

properties.name: TitlePlayerAccountId
properties.description: The Title Player Account Id of the associated entity.

properties.name: Action
properties.description: The action this statement effects. May be 'Read', 'Write' or '*' for both read and write.

properties.name: Comment
properties.description: A comment about the statement. Intended solely for bookkeeping and debugging.

properties.name: Condition
properties.description: Additional conditions to be applied for entity resources.

properties.name: Effect
properties.description: The effect this statement will have. It may be either Allow or Deny

properties.name: Principal
properties.description: The principal this statement will effect.

properties.name: Resource
properties.description: The resource this statements effects. Similar to 'pfrn:data--title![Title ID]/Profile/*'

properties.name: Entity
properties.description: The entity id and type.

properties.name: EntityChain
properties.description: The chain of responsibility for this entity. Use Lineage.

properties.name: Files
properties.description: The files on this profile.

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: The display name of the entity. This field may serve different purposes for different entity types. i.e.: for a title player account it could represent the display name of the player, whereas on a character it could be character's name.

properties.name: Language
properties.description: The language on this profile.

properties.name: Lineage
properties.description: The lineage of this profile.

properties.name: Objects
properties.description: The objects on this profile.

properties.name: Permissions
properties.description: The permissions that govern access to this entity profile and its properties. Only includes permissions set on this profile, not global statements from titles and namespaces.

properties.name: VersionNumber
properties.description: The version number of the profile in persistent storage at the time of the read. Used for optional optimistic concurrency during update.

EntityProfileFileMetadata.name: EntityProfileFileMetadata
EntityProfileFileMetadata.description: An entity file's meta data. To get a download URL call File/GetFiles API.

properties.name: Checksum
properties.description: Checksum value for the file

properties.name: FileName
properties.description: Name of the file

properties.name: LastModified
properties.description: Last UTC time the file was modified

properties.name: Size
properties.description: Storage service's reported byte count

GetEntityProfileRequest.name: GetEntityProfileRequest
GetEntityProfileRequest.description: Given an entity type and entity identifier will retrieve the profile from the entity store. If the profile being retrieved is the caller's, then the read operation is consistent, if not it is an inconsistent read. An inconsistent read means that we do not guarantee all committed writes have occurred before reading the profile, allowing for a stale read. If consistency is important the Version Number on the result can be used to compare which version of the profile any reader has.

properties.name: DataAsObject
properties.description: Determines whether the objects will be returned as an escaped JSON string or as a un-escaped JSON object. Default is JSON string.

properties.name: Entity
properties.description: The entity to perform this action on.

properties.name: Profile
properties.description: Entity profile

GetEntityProfilesRequest.name: GetEntityProfilesRequest
GetEntityProfilesRequest.description: Given a set of entity types and entity identifiers will retrieve all readable profiles properties for the caller. Profiles that the caller is not allowed to read will silently not be included in the results.

properties.name: DataAsObject
properties.description: Determines whether the objects will be returned as an escaped JSON string or as a un-escaped JSON object. Default is JSON string.

properties.name: Entities
properties.description: Entity keys of the profiles to load. Must be between 1 and 25

properties.name: Profiles
properties.description: Entity profiles

GetGlobalPolicyRequest.name: GetGlobalPolicyRequest
GetGlobalPolicyRequest.description: Retrieves the title access policy that is used before the profile's policy is inspected during a request. If never customized this will return the default starter policy built by PlayFab.

properties.name: Permissions
properties.description: The permissions that govern access to all entities under this title or namespace.

SetEntityProfilePolicyRequest.name: SetEntityProfilePolicyRequest
SetEntityProfilePolicyRequest.description: This will set the access policy statements on the given entity profile. This is not additive, any existing statements will be replaced with the statements in this request.

properties.name: Entity
properties.description: The entity to perform this action on.

properties.name: Statements
properties.description: The statements to include in the access policy.

properties.name: Permissions
properties.description: The permissions that govern access to this entity profile and its properties. Only includes permissions set on this profile, not global statements from titles and namespaces.

SetFriendlyNameRequest.name: SetFriendlyNameRequest
SetFriendlyNameRequest.description: Given an entity profile, will update its friendly name to the one passed in if the profile's version is equal to or newer than the specified value

properties.name: Entity
properties.description: The entity to perform this action on.

properties.name: ExpectedVersion
properties.description: The expected version of a profile to perform this update on

properties.name: FriendlyName
properties.description: The new value to be set on Entity Profile's friendly name

properties.name: OperationResult
properties.description: The type of operation that occured on the profile's friendly name

properties.name: VersionNumber
properties.description: The updated version of the profile after the friendly name update

SetGlobalPolicyRequest.name: SetGlobalPolicyRequest
SetGlobalPolicyRequest.description: Updates the title access policy that is used before the profile's policy is inspected during a request. Policies are compiled and cached for several minutes so an update here may not be reflected in behavior for a short time.

properties.name: Permissions
properties.description: The permissions that govern access to all entities under this title or namespace.

SetProfileLanguageRequest.name: SetProfileLanguageRequest
SetProfileLanguageRequest.description: Given an entity profile, will update its language to the one passed in if the profile's version is at least the one passed in.

properties.name: Entity
properties.description: The entity to perform this action on.

properties.name: ExpectedVersion
properties.description: The expected version of a profile to perform this update on

properties.name: Language
properties.description: The language to set on the given entity. Deletes the profile's language if passed in a null string.

properties.name: OperationResult
properties.description: The type of operation that occured on the profile's language

properties.name: VersionNumber
properties.description: The updated version of the profile after the language update

calls.name: GetGlobalPolicy
calls.summary: Gets the global title access policy
calls.requestDetails: Retrieves the title access policy that is used before the profile's policy is inspected during a request. If never customized this will return the default starter policy built by PlayFab.

calls.name: GetProfile
calls.requestDetails: Given an entity type and entity identifier will retrieve the profile from the entity store. If the profile being retrieved is the caller's, then the read operation is consistent, if not it is an inconsistent read. An inconsistent read means that we do not guarantee all committed writes have occurred before reading the profile, allowing for a stale read. If consistency is important the Version Number on the result can be used to compare which version of the profile any reader has.

calls.name: GetProfiles
calls.requestDetails: Given a set of entity types and entity identifiers will retrieve all readable profiles properties for the caller. Profiles that the caller is not allowed to read will silently not be included in the results.

calls.name: SetFriendlyName
calls.summary: Update the friendly name of the entity
calls.requestDetails: Given an entity profile, will update its friendly name to the one passed in if the profile's version is equal to or newer than the specified value

calls.name: SetGlobalPolicy
calls.summary: Sets the global title access policy
calls.requestDetails: Updates the title access policy that is used before the profile's policy is inspected during a request. Policies are compiled and cached for several minutes so an update here may not be reflected in behavior for a short time.

calls.name: SetProfileLanguage
calls.summary: Updates the entity's language. The precedence hierarchy for communication to the player is Title Player Account language, Master Player Account language, and then title default language if the first two aren't set or supported.
calls.requestDetails: Given an entity profile, will update its language to the one passed in if the profile's version is at least the one passed in.

calls.name: SetProfilePolicy
calls.requestDetails: This will set the access policy statements on the given entity profile. This is not additive, any existing statements will be replaced with the statements in this request.
